thread.section_title: Snug as a Bug Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Snug as a Bug | snugasabug.com
thread.title: Kat Howlett
thread.title_full: Snug as a Bug reviewed by Kat Howlett

author: Kat Howlett
title: Kat Howlett
text:
I love this onesie! I ordered it for my boyfriend (size L) and I borrow it all the time, the material is of excellent quality and it's crafted welll, you can see the stitching is made to last.
I highly recommend these onesies and will definitely be ordering from them in the future!!
